kind.description: Secret store kind - `SecretStore` or `ClusterSecretStore`. Defaults to `ClusterSecretStore` if omitted.

name.description: Name of the secret store resource

secretProvider.description: Secret store provider. Must be one of External Secrets providers. Defaults to `PLATFORM_SECRET_STORE_PROVIDER` env variable.

vault.description: Name of the 1Password vault. Defaults to `ONE_PASSWORD_VAULT` env variable.

secret.description: 1Password secret access token. Defaults to `ONE_PASSWORD_SECRET` env variable.

accessTokenSecretName.description: Name of the secret resource to which the access token will be stored. Defaults to `ONE_PASSWORD_TOKEN_SECRET_NAME` env variable.

accessTokenSecretKey.description: Name of the key in the secret resource to which the access token will be stored. Defaults to `ONE_PASSWORD_TOKEN_SECRET_KEY` env variable.
